rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新证据挑战围绕癌症血液检测的炒作英国医学杂志 (BMJ) 今天发布的新证据对 NHS 承诺检测 50 多种癌症的大肆宣传的血液检测提出了质疑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/New-evidence-challenges-hype-surrounding-cancer-blood-test.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/New-evidence-challenges-hype-surrounding-cancer-blood-test.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3007d4b-70f1-4c96-a6d0-23a5af3f46f1 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 00:20:11 -0400 New evidence challenges hype surrounding cancer blood test
增加皮肤接触时间与更好的神经发育有关斯坦福大学医学院的一项新研究表明，与父母肌肤相亲的拥抱对早产儿的认知能力有持久的好处。研究发现，在新生儿住院期间接受更多皮肤接触（也称为袋鼠式护理）的早产儿在一岁时发育迟缓的可能性较小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Increased-skin-to-skin-time-linked-to-better-neurodevelopment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/Increased-skin-to-skin-time-linked-to-better-neurodevelopment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d06ce5f-be4e-4d92-86b8-67ede3eab0e7 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 00:10:25 -0400 Increased skin-to-skin time linked to better neurodevelopment
高 BPA 水平与老年男性前列腺癌风险增加有关《营养》杂志上的一项研究发现，美国老年男性尿液中较高的双酚 A (BPA) 水平与前列腺特异性抗原 (PSA) 增加和较高的前列腺癌风险有关。这表明需要加强癌症筛查，尤其是高危人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/High-BPA-levels-linked-to-increased-prostate-cancer-risk-in-older-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240808/High-BPA-levels-linked-to-increased-prostate-cancer-risk-in-older-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e836e73-0289-43a9-b415-3fb829708756 Thu, 08 Aug 2024 00:10:00 -0400 High BPA levels linked to increased prostate cancer risk in older men
青少年含糖饮料消费量惊人增长对 185 个国家儿童和青少年饮食习惯的一项新的全球分析显示，与 1990 年相比，2018 年青少年平均消耗的含糖饮料增加了近 23%。总体而言，男孩和女孩的摄入量相似，但男孩和女孩的摄入量更高。青少年、城市居民以及父母文化水平较低的子女。塔夫茨大学弗里德曼营养科学与政策学院的研究人员于 2024 年 8 月 7 日在《英国医学杂志》上发表了研究结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Alarming-rise-in-sugary-drink-conspiration-among-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Alarming-rise-in-sugary-drink-conspiration-among-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23594f1d-1b1b-4c03-9f90-ad2ba09462ba Wed, 07 Aug 2024 23:46:53 -0400 Alarming rise in sugary drink consumption among youth
淀粉样蛋白免疫疗法治疗早期阿尔茨海默病：前景光明但充满挑战研究人员强调了使用淀粉样蛋白免疫疗法治疗早期阿尔茨海默病的复杂性，讨论了其临床益处、挑战和更广泛的健康影响。尽管取得了一些积极的成果，但对不利影响、试验偏差和成本的担忧阻碍了广泛采用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Amyloid-immunotherapy-for-early-Alzheimers-Promising-but-fraught-with-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Amyloid-immunotherapy-for-early-Alzheimers-Promising-but-fraught-with-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ddb82d5b-bdf2-493d-9c89-6a42443aa2dd Wed, 07 Aug 2024 23:37:00 -0400 Amyloid immunotherapy for early Alzheimer's: Promising but fraught with challenges
重组带状疱疹疫苗可降低痴呆症风险，尤其是女性发表在《自然医学》上的研究发现，重组带状疱疹疫苗可降低患痴呆症的风险。这种保护作用在女性中尤其显着，表明重组疫苗相对于活疫苗具有潜在优势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Recombinant-shingles-vaccine-linked-to-lower-dementia-risk-special-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Recombinant-shingles-vaccine-linked-to-lower-dementia-risk-special-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5e9494e-aee4-4e49-a844-77a5ddddf12e Wed, 07 Aug 2024 23:17:00 -0400 Recombinant shingles vaccine linked to lower dementia risk, especially in women
研究人员确定了唐氏综合症的独特分子特征科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学院 Linda Crnic 唐氏综合症研究所 (Crnic Institute) 的研究人员在《自然通讯》上发表的一项新研究报告了一项重大突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Researchers-identify-distinct-molecular-profiles-in-Down-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Researchers-identify-distinct-molecular-profiles-in-Down-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d2c2883-4e1b-4b9f-858a-46785c9ef660 Wed, 07 Aug 2024 23:08:00 -0400 Researchers identify distinct molecular profiles in Down syndrome
新方法推进可植入人体器官的创造在体外培养功能性人体器官是器官移植医学长期追求的“圣杯”，但目前仍难以实现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/New-method-advances-the-creation-of-implantable- human-organs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/New-method-advances-the-creation-of-implantable- human-organs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de9c0116-69b0-4901-b39e-a0790c4d0037 Wed, 07 Aug 2024 23:05:00 -0400 New method advances the creation of implantable human organs
研究发现突触强度是维持老年记忆的关键在人的一生中，记忆力会出现不同程度的衰退，使老年人失去回忆个人经历的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Research-finds-synaptic-strength-key-to-maintaining-memory-in-old-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Research-finds-synaptic-strength-key-to-maintaining-memory-in-old-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bea525e-3cd7-4bfe-a42f-3940e5545ed6 Wed, 07 Aug 2024 23:00:32 -0400 Research finds synaptic strength key to maintaining memory in old age
手术后放疗可预防乳腺癌复发长达 10 年一项长期研究表明，术后进行放射治疗可以在长达 10 年内防止乳腺癌在同一部位复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Radiotherapy-after-surgery-shown-to-prevent-breast-cancer-recurrence-for-up-to-10-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Radiotherapy-after-surgery-shown-to-prevent-breast-cancer-recurrence-for-up-to-10-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09268a2f-cf2f-4532-81ff-f693514327cf Wed, 07 Aug 2024 22:55:38 -0400 Radiotherapy after surgery shown to prevent breast cancer recurrence for up to 10 years
